qas.question: If P is ultimately proven to be equal tot NP, what effect would this have on the efficiency of problems?

answers.text: shown to have more efficient solutions
many important problems can be shown to have more efficient solutions

qas.question: What is a particular problem in biology that would benefit from determining that P = NP?
What is the prize offered for finding a solution to P=NP?

plausible_answers.text: The question of whether P equals NP

qas.question: What is one of the least important open questions in theoretical computer science?
What effect would happen if P is ultimately proven to not equal NP ?
What is a particular problem in chemistry that would benefit from determining that P = NP?
What problem was proposed by Clay Mathematics Institute at the Alpha Prize Problems?
What was the prize for finding a solution to P=NP at the the Alpha Prize Problems?
